name: Shaohao's Lessons
description:
Each time you cast Sheilun's Gift, you learn one of Shaohao's Lessons for up to 30 sec, based on how many clouds of mist are consumed.

Lesson of Doubt: Your spells and abilities deal up to 35% more healing and damage to targets, based on their current health.

Lesson of Despair: Your Critical Strike is increased by 30% while above 50% health.

Lesson of Fear: Decreases your damage taken by 15% and increases your Haste by 25%.

Lesson of Anger: 25% of the damage or healing you deal is duplicated every 4 sec.
